title: Anshumathi
description: Adavi Baapiraju or Aḍivi Bāpirāju (1895–1952) was a famous Telugu novelist, poet, playwright, painter and art director. He was born on October 8, 1895 at Sarepalle near Bheemavaram in West Godavari district of Andhra. He is known for his works like Gonaganna Reddy, Narayanarao, Himabindu etc.Ansumati is a historical novella with a Chalukya background with primary school children in view.
author: Adivi Bapiraju
